namespace = flavor_syr

# Archimedes trigger
flavor_syr.1 = {
	type = province_event
	hidden = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		exists = owner 
		this = p:84
	}

	immediate = {
		owner = { 
			trigger_event = { id = flavor_syr.2 }
		}
	}
}

# Archimedes
flavor_syr.2 = {
	type = country_event
	title = "flavor_syr.2.t"
	desc = "flavor_syr.2.desc"
	picture = greek_philosophers
	left_portrait = current_ruler
	right_portrait = scope:archimedes_scope
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	immediate = {
		p:84 = { save_scope_as = syracuse_scope }
		hidden_effect = {
			create_character = {
				first_name = "Archimedes"
				family_name = "Phidid"
				culture = syracusan
				religion = roman_pantheon
				age = 25
				female = no
				no_stats = yes
				add_martial = 9
				add_finesse = 13
				add_charisma = 6
				add_zeal = 8
				no_traits = yes
				add_trait = scholar
				add_trait = original_thinker
				set_variable = archimedes_flag
				save_scope_as = archimedes_scope
				dna = ""
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = flavor_syr.2.a
		custom_tooltip = flavor_syr.2.at
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = archimedes_modifier 
			duration = 14600 # 40 years
		}
	}
}

# Corcyra
flavor_syr.3 = {
	type = country_event
	title = "flavor_syr.3.t"
	desc = "flavor_syr.3.desc"
	picture = grand_ship
	left_portrait = current_ruler
	goto_location = p:470

	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		NOT = { owns_or_subject_owns = 470 }
	}

	option = {
		name = flavor_syr.3.a
		p:470 = { add_claim = root }
	}
}
